The Samsung The Frame (49) is likely positioned by the credenza, as it is the only TV currently powered on. The Samsung 8 Series (82) is powered off and may be located elsewhere in the space.

In contrast, the Samsung 8 Series (82) is powered off, with a volume level of 0 and muted. Actionable controls for the Samsung The Frame (49) include switching it on/off, adjusting the volume, and changing the input source. The Samsung 8 Series (82) can be powered on, but it currently has no volume or channel settings active.
